meanings.definition: Failure to conform or comply with a rule or standard.
meanings.sent1: Her nonconformance with the dress code led to a warning from the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The company takes nonconformance seriously and addresses it promptly.
meanings.sent3: The nonconformance of the cat to the 'no jumping on the table' rule was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His nonconformance to the traditional way of doing things made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The nonconformance of the student to the assignment guidelines was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: An instance of not conforming or complying with a rule or standard.
meanings.sent1: The manager documented each nonconformance to track patterns of behavior.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed the nonconformance during their weekly meeting.
meanings.sent3: The nonconformance of the alarm clock to wake him up on time caused him to miss the bus.
meanings.sent4: The nonconformance of the car engine to start in the cold weather was frustrating.
meanings.sent5: The nonconformance of the package delivery to arrive on schedule caused inconvenience for the recipient.
